articles.description: The Outsiders has revealed the new Broadway cast, including six actors making their Broadway debuts, that will begin performances together at the Bernard B. Jacobs Theatre.
articles.content:
The Outsiders has revealed the new Broadway cast, including six actors making their Broadway debuts, that will begin performances together on Tuesday, March 17 at the Bernard B. Jacobs Theatre.
